title: Hour 1 - Kyrie Opts In, Stanley Cup Travels
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Kyrie Opts In, Stanley Cup Travels
description:
Dan discusses what happens now that Kyrie Irving has opted in with the Brooklyn Nets, and revisits some of the most outrageous adventures we've seen the Stanley Cup experience over the years.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
